encodingDesc.p: The source of the encoded text is the transcription, made on Transkribus, of a set of images of the Historia, acquired from The Internet Archive. The encoding of the work is linked with the Beta maṣāḥǝft Schema, and it is made following the BetaMasaheft Guidelines.

abstract.p: This work about the Ethiopic history was written by Hiob Ludolf and it was published in 1681. From the beginning, the plan of the work included the drafting of the Commentarius, published by the same author in 1691.
